bug.author: ivenk
bug.summary: [Doc] Broken reference link in basic text classification tutorial
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>DOC Issue</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/keras/basic_text_classification>https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/keras/basic_text_classification</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
Broken(Wrong) Link in basic text classification tutorial. Needs to be updated/removed/changed. <denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
In the basic text classification tutorial (imdb reviews) the reference link for pad_sequences points to <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/preprocessing/sequence/pad_sequences>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/preprocessing/sequence/pad_sequences</denchmark-link> but you get redirected to <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/preprocessing>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/preprocessing</denchmark-link>
which is pretty unhelpful. + on <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/preprocessing>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/preprocessing</denchmark-link>
the reference link to the keras documentation returns a 404. So there is not much information to be gained from following that link.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ivenk>@ivenk</denchmark-link> Thanks for finding this broken link. I am closing the issue as it was resolved by the PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/pull/629>tensorflow/docs#629</denchmark-link> . Thanks!
